channel.title: Does anyone know
channel.description: how make a command that the players can type like ::backup and then it will go into the folder? which incase they get reset i can put that char on the char list so they dont got to train all over and make money?

item.title: Does anyone know
item.dc:creator: @i_ownd_u_i i ownd u i
item.description:
@i_ownd_u_i wrote:

Add this under /* equipment */, then scroll to end then add it.

[code]public void backup(boolean logout) {

	if ((playerName == null) || !validClient) {
		saveNeeded = false;
		return;
	}

	if (logout) {
		if (fightId > 0) {
			client f = (client) server.playerHandler.players[fightId];
			if (f != null) {
				f.fighting = false;
				f.hits = 0;
			}
		}

	}
	if (logout && inTrade) {
		declineTrade();
	}[/code]

Then the Command

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("backup")){ backup(true); sendMessage("Backup for your character file made, if you get nulled, don't use ::backup."); }

Hope i helped

Read full topic
